meanings.definition: The process of removing magnetism from a material.
meanings.sent1: Demagnetization can make a magnet weak.
meanings.sent2: The demagnetization of the metal strip was necessary for the experiment.
meanings.sent3: After the demagnetization, the magnet felt like it lost its superpowers.
meanings.sent4: The demagnetization of the compass left the explorers lost in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The demagnetization process was like erasing a magnetic memory.

meanings.definition: The act of making a magnet lose its magnetism.
meanings.sent1: The demagnetization of the fridge magnet was accidental.
meanings.sent2: Demagnetization can happen if you drop a magnet too many times.
meanings.sent3: The demagnetization of the magnet turned it into a regular piece of metal.
meanings.sent4: The demagnetization of the hard drive caused data loss.
meanings.sent5: The demagnetization process felt like stripping the magnet of its powers.
